thread.title: Sydney Just Wedding Cars Issue Greece Honeymoon Advice
thread.title_full: Sydney Just Wedding Cars Issue Greece Honeymoon Advice

author: prbuzz.com
title: Sydney Just Wedding Cars Issue Greece Honeymoon Advice
text:
Just wedding cars a leading wedding car hire company in Sydney issues advice on taking a honeymoon in Greece due to the serious financial problems the country is facing.
Many people getting married in Sydney and thinking of having their honeymoon in Greece have become concerned over the serious financial problems the country is having. To help people thinking of having a honeymoon in Greece the Sydney wedding car hire experts Just Wedding Cars, has issued some tips and advice.
A lot of people have been considering cancelling their honeymoon in Greece due to the financial crisis. However, according to Just Wedding Cars there is no need to worry or consider cancelling their honeymoon.
A spokesman for Just Wedding said: “Greece is a wonderful country to have a honeymoon in. To help people feel happier about going to Greece for their honeymoon due to the financial crisis, we have put these tips together.”
The following tips issued by Sydney Just Wedding Cars will help people getting married in Sydney and having a holiday in Greece as part of their honeymoon, to have an enjoyable holiday without any problems.
Tip 1
Take extra money instead of relying on debit and credit cars. The Sydney wedding car hire experts have warned that credit and debit cards may not work in cash machines due to banks running out of cash.
Tip 2
Use cash in shops and restaurants. Due to the financial crisis many shops and restaurants and other businesses are not accepting credit and debit cards.
Tip 3
Contact the hotel or accommodation to make sure they have been paid and the financial crisis is not affecting the booking. Although most hotels and accommodation should have been paid, it is important to contact them and double check the financial crisis has not affected the booking.
Tip 4
Take emergency money just in case. It is important to have extra money while taking a holiday in Greece according to Sydney Just Wedding Cars. The extra money could be used to find alternative accommodation if the hotel had to close due to not being able to pay their staff. But the wedding experts said this would be highly unlikely to happen, but it is still advisable to have an emergency fund.
To learn more about the popular Sydney wedding car hire service, please visit http://www.justweddingcars.com.au
About Just Wedding Cars
Just Wedding Cars is not just another bridal car hire service. Founded on the principal of taking pride in enhancing their customer big event, Just Wedding Cars exists to give people the level of professional service they deserve and memories that will last beyond the occasion.
